## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                  | Type                             | Default      |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------- | -------------------------------- | ------------ |
| `direction` | `direction` | Define component orientation | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`     | `'vertical'` |
| `size`      | `size`      | Define illustration size     | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`   |


## Slots

| Slot             | Description          |
| ---------------- | -------------------- |
| `"details"`      | Details content      |
| `"illustration"` | Illustration content |
| `"title"`        | Title content        |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                          | Description                                                                               |
| --------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--mg-c-illustrated-message-spacing-vertical` | Defines the vertical padding of the illustrated message. Default value: `--mg-b-size-40`. |
